component.comment: This CA_SN 0x10000 pairing is used when the Customer Operator library is linked with the CAK V7. This pairing key is provided for use in a development environment only. Production STB shall never be manufactured with this key and deployed. This key shall be exchanged security and destroyed when it's no longer needed. For details on obtaining and using actual production pairing keys, please reference the Nagravision Pairing Key Handling Procedures document.
component.name: ER-Telecom_000K0299.D33

component.comment: This CA_SN 0x10000 pairing is used when the CSO Operator library is linked. For CAK V6, this key can also be used when the actual Customer Operator library is linked. This pairing key is provided for use in a development environment only. Production STB shall never be manufactured with this key and deployed. This key shall be exchanged security. For details on obtaining and using actual production pairing keys, please reference the Nagravision Pairing Key Handling Procedures document.
